sentence: Even if he clinched the nomination, he’d still have to face off against the state’s lieutenant governor John Fetterman, who’s both very popular and much more social media savvy.
author: Matt Prigge
title: Dr. Oz Is Big Mad That He Was Asked To Quit His Presidential Council Post (Ditto Herschel Walker)

author: Chris Cillizza
title: The ridiculous price tag for a Senate race

sentence: The Democratic frontrunner is John Fetterman, the lieutenant governor of Pennsylvania who sports a goatee, supports both state and federal legalization of marijuana and takes to the campaign trail in his gym shorts and black pickup truck.
author: Mya Jaradat
title: Races to watch in the 2022 midterms
